name: Navigation Sidebar
description: Composite export for NavigationSidebar and related items.

use: you need a vertical sidebar navigation with labels.
you want a concise import for navigation bar items.
avoid: a bottom navigation bar is more appropriate.

examples.minimal:
NavigationSidebar(
  index: 0,
  onSelected: (index) {},
  children: const [
    NavigationItem(child: Icon(Icons.home), label: Text('Home')),
    NavigationItem(child: Icon(Icons.settings), label: Text('Settings')),
  ],
)

theming: Uses navigation bar theming from the navigation registry.
accessibility: Provide clear labels and focus states for navigation items.
do: Keep the selected index in sync with routing.
dont: Hide essential navigation behind unlabelled icons.
